channel.title: ZombieScape
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]ZombieScape[/size]
This is a game I was working on for awhile whenever I got bored, It's still very glitchy, I would like to have people play it and tell me there feedback, the download contains the instructions in the "READ ME.txt"[/center]
Known Bugs/glitches/kinks...
-You don't die when you'r health is <= 0. -There is no "RestorePacks" -There is no way to restore your ammo.
-------------------------
src and bin is included incase you want to edit this or whatever.
compiler isn't included so either make your own, or do it via the command line. -------------------------
please report any other glitches you find, I'm thinking about continuing this project later but I just got bored of it, but it will probably sit in my eclipse workspace for awhile.
here is a pic for no reason...
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wrht0m.jpg[/img]
LINK: http://up.ht/xW4mTw

item.title: ZombieScape
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

[center][size=24pt]ZombieScape[/size]

This is a game I was working on for awhile whenever I got bored, It’s still very glitchy, I would like to have people play it and tell me there feedback, the download contains the instructions in the “READ ME.txt”[/center]

Known Bugs/glitches/kinks…

-You don’t die when you’r health is <= 0.
-There is no “RestorePacks”
-There is no way to restore your ammo.

src and bin is included incase you want to edit this or whatever.

compiler isn’t included so either make your own, or do it via the command line.

please report any other glitches you find, I’m thinking about continuing this project later but I just got bored of it, but it will probably sit in my eclipse workspace for awhile.

here is a pic for no reason…

wrht0m.jpg911×600

LINK: http://up.ht/xW4mTw
